positions.subtitle: E-Cell, IIT Bombay
positions.description: Co-headed the yearlong activities of the completely student-run entrepreneurship cell. Organised startup-investor meetups, Eureka (B-model competition with 10k+ entries) and a 2-day entrepreneurship summit with live funding events on the lines of Shark Tank. In a first, the event got featured at NASDAQ in New York.
